title: Cheesy Cauliflower Cheddar Bake with Optional Beef Sausage

instructions.default: Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Tin: Defrost. Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Tin / Vegetarian: Defrost. Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
instructions.Frozen Tin / Sausage: Defrost. Bake uncovered at 350 for 10 min or until warm.
